name: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
achievementgroup: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I

stage1.title: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
stage1.description: Complete a total of 10 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage2.title: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
stage2.description: Complete a total of 20 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage3.title: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
stage3.description: Complete a total of 40 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.
